price: 48.Kaadu usun Yallaa kee kay farmoyta fan secsiman waqdi, itta elle weenimil ken fan meklamkeh, too waqdi horta keenik Yallaa kee kay farmoytih mekla (cokmi) cintaah wohut derre cabía.
arabic: وَإِذَا دُعُوٓاْ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ لِيَحۡكُمَ بَيۡنَهُمۡ إِذَا فَرِيقٞ مِّنۡهُم مُّعۡرِضُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā duʿū ilā al-lahi warasūlihi liyaḥkuma baynahum idhā farīqun min'hum muʿ'riḍūna
